snippet: A class in preserving food was among dozens offered at a fair in Lewis County, N.Y., in celebration of International Homesteading Education Month.
abstract: Lowville Journal; attendees at the inaugural Lewis County, NY, Homesteading Fair participate in dozens of classes in subjects related to sustainable living; classes, offered by the Cornell University Cooperative Extension, are part of a nationwide celebration of International Homesteading Education Month.
lead_paragraph: A class in preserving food was among dozens offered at a fair in Lewis County, N.Y., in celebration of International Homesteading Education Month.

headline.seo: In Lowville, N.Y., Lessons on Sustainable Living
headline.main: Learning to Can Meats and Charm Wary Sheep
headline.print_headline: Learning to Can Meats And Charm Wary Sheep
